Title: BlogEngine.NET Custom Posts Control
Description: This is a simple BlogEngine.NET control which can be used in a custom page within a BlogEngine.NET site to display posts from a certain category for use in a custom landing page or the likes. It can be easily modified to show posts from all categories too.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
This is a simple BlogEngine.NET control which can be used in a custom page within a BlogEngine.NET site to display posts from a certain category for use in a custom landing page or the likes. It can be easily modified to show posts from all categories too.

Gregory Kornblum - Tensai Labs
